column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/7e8098dadb1216b69b87af39fe0140d68e4600ce for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
@wtogami \nI will do that the next time I do translations. Thank you for sharing :)\n
@sandakersmann Warren was being polite. Pull requests for translations _will not be merged_. Transifex is the only accepted way to contribute translations.\n
@luke-jr \nOk. Need to look into that some other time.\n
Yeah, sorry, we cannot even merge them this way, the next time we merge from transifex they will get overwritten with the old translation.\n
